Name: Blocky McBlockFace
About the game: Description! Play as Blocky McBlockFace in this totally intense top-down shooter. The goal is to assert dominance and take down as many blocks as you can. Use a crazy arsenal of weapons to take down the blocks. This game is scrubby.
